Name: PagerDuty - Create Incident
Description: Creates an Incident against a PagerDuty Service.

Parameters.Name: PagerDuty.API.AuthorizationToken
Parameters.Label: Token
Parameters.HelpText:
Please supply the API token of your PagerDuty instance.

Found here: https://mydomain.pagerduty.com/api_keys

Parameters.Name: PagerDuty.Incident.Title
Parameters.Label: Title
Parameters.HelpText: Please enter a title for this incident.

Parameters.Name: PagerDuty.Body.Details
Parameters.Label: Details
Parameters.HelpText: Please enter the details of the Incident.

Parameters.Name: PagerDuty.Service.Id
Parameters.Label: Service Id
Parameters.HelpText: Please enter the Service Id for the Incident.

Parameters.Name: PagerDuty.Priority.Code
Parameters.Label: Priority
Parameters.HelpText: Please select a Priority level for the Incident.

DisplaySettings.Octopus.SelectOptions:
None|None
P1|P1
P2|P2
P3|P3
P4|P4
P5|P5

Parameters.Name: PagerDuty.Urgency.Code
Parameters.Label: Urgency
Parameters.HelpText: Please enter an Urgency for the Incident.

Parameters.Name: PagerDuty.EscalationPolicy.Id
Parameters.Label: Escalation Policy Id
Parameters.HelpText: Please enter an Escalation Policy Id, leave blank if you don't have one.
